Restitution.definition: a restoration of something to its rightful owner b
Restitution.origin: [ordered to pay to the victim of his crime]

1 a.definition: a restoration of something to its rightful owner

sub_terms.b: a making good of or giving an equivalent for some injury

2 a.definition: the equitable remedy of restoring to an aggrieved party that which was obtained in unjust enrichment

sub_terms.b: a remedy for breach of contract that consists of restoring the aggrieved party to the status quo that existed before the contract was made

3.definition: an amount to be paid for the purpose of restitution [ordered to pay to the victim of his crime] compare
